body:
v1.0.0 Release

## Features

* Add `inspectpack` for deep bundle introspection and analysis.
    * Add `min+gz` sizes per module to modules pane.
    * Add duplicates + version analysis to problems pane.
* Add plugin host option. [#188](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/webpack-dashboard/pull/188)
* Add keyboard navigation for main log. [#203](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/webpack-dashboard/pull/203)

## Docs

* Add OS support section. [#210](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/webpack-dashboard/pull/210)

## Fixes

* Fix minimal sizing of the 3 lower boxes. [#199](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/webpack-dashboard/pull/199)
* Do not output log when errors are present. [#200](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/webpack-dashboard/pull/200)
* Disable `inspectpack` introspection in `--minimal` mode. [#202](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/webpack-dashboard/pull/202)
* Infer webpack configuration state from `NODE_ENV`. [#204](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/webpack-dashboard/pull/204)

## Quality

* Add basic tests + various test infrastructure. [#208](https://github.com/FormidableLabs/webpack-dashboard/pull/208)
- Adds the ability to run webpack-dashboard standalone, without passing child process as an argument
- Removes unnecessary ipc option to fix output in certain cases

- Switches to socket.io for socket comms
- Fixes color output

- Fixes `--color` flag where not applicable
- Adds percentage text to progress bar

- Fixes issues with spawn on Windows
- Fixes output color issues
- Fixes default term color bug

- Introduces `webpack-dashboard` binary
- Introduces minimal mode
- Provides socket based communication method
- Performance fixes
